title: Commission Slots Opening this Friday!
description: This is just a heads up for those interested that I will be opening up my November commission slots Friday morning November 1st. Like the last few months there will be four spots available and I’ll be using my Atristree site to handle these commissions. I had a lot of fun with the four I did in October which included a couple D&D characters, a Pokemon and an original character. Here’s a little peek at the pieces I did in the last month.
excerpt: Videogaming-related online strip by Mike Krahulik and Jerry Holkins. Includes news and commentary.
text: October 29, 2024 This is just a heads up for those interested that I will be opening up my November commission slots Friday morning November 1st. Like the last few months there will be four spots available and I’ll be using my Atristree site to handle these commissions. I had a lot of fun with the four I did in October which included a couple D&D characters, a Pokemon and an original character. Here’s a little peek at the pieces I did in the last month. As always I am happy to draw your favorite character from games, movies, comics or something you cooked up yourself. Thank you to everyone who has supported me through these commissions. I've really enjoyed working with you all! -Gabe out
html:
October 29, 2024

This is just a heads up for those interested that I will be opening up my November commission slots Friday morning November 1st. Like the last few months there will be four spots available and I’ll be using my Atristree site to handle these commissions. I had a lot of fun with the four I did in October which included a couple D&D characters, a Pokemon and an original character. Here’s a little peek at the pieces I did in the last month.


As always I am happy to draw your favorite character from games, movies, comics or something you cooked up yourself. Thank you to everyone who has supported me through these commissions. I've really enjoyed working with you all!


-Gabe out
